resources.string: Nope, it's Tomas. But folks around here have been calling me Torchy ever since I- uh…was a kid. \n\nYes…a perfectly normal nickname.

string.comment: Refers to her lover, Ruiz Velazquez
string.speaker: Evelyn Van Heck
string.name: Evelyn Van Heck

resources.string: It is hard not to grow close to someone in our profession. The day we met, he told me he would always have my back if I had his.\n\nI do not know what he was afraid of, but I promised and he was mine thereafter.
